java/liquibase/parser/visitor/UpdateVisitor.java

00001 package liquibase.parser.visitor;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.ChangeSet;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.exception.LiquibaseException;
00006 import liquibase.log.LogFactory;
00007 
00008 import java.util.logging.Logger;
00009 
00010 public class UpdateVisitor implements ChangeSetVisitor {
00011 
00012     private Database database;
00013 
00014     private Logger log = LogFactory.getLogger();
00015 
00016     public UpdateVisitor(Database database) {
00017         this.database = database;
00018     }
00019 
00020     public Direction getDirection() {
00021         return ChangeSetVisitor.Direction.FORWARD;
00022     }
00023     
00024     public void visit(ChangeSet changeSet, Database database) throws LiquibaseException {
00025         log.finer("Running Changeset:" + changeSet);
00026         if (changeSet.execute(this.database)) {
00027             if (this.database.getRunStatus(changeSet).equals(ChangeSet.RunStatus.NOT_RAN)) {
00028                 this.database.markChangeSetAsRan(changeSet);
00029             } else {
00030                 this.database.markChangeSetAsReRan(changeSet);
00031             }
00032         }
00033 
00034         this.database.commit();
00035     }
00036 }
